Directions: In a large bowl, combine the fruit; set aside. In another bowl, whisk milk, orange juice concentrate and pudding mix for 2 minutes or until smooth. Add sour cream; mix well. Fold into fruit. Cover and refrigerate until serving.
Ingredients: 1 (20 ounce) can unsweetened pineapple chunks, drained
4 medium tart apples, peeled and diced
1 (1 ounce) package sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix
